requirements.name: Annual Report
requirements.description: Annual report filed with the Florida Department of State Division of Corporations

requirements.name: Solicitation of Contributions Registration (CH Form)
requirements.description: Registration with the Florida Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services for organizations soliciting donations
requirements.agency: Florida Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services

requirements.name: Annual Financial Report
requirements.description: Annual financial report filed with Department of Agriculture if registered for charitable solicitation
requirements.due_date: Within 6 months after fiscal year end or with extensions within 9 months
requirements.agency: Florida Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services

requirements.name: Form 990 Series
requirements.description: IRS Form 990, 990-EZ, or 990-N required for tax-exempt organizations

requirements.name: Consumer's Certificate of Exemption (DR-14)
requirements.description: Sales tax exemption certificate for qualifying nonprofit purchases

requirements.name: Reemployment Tax Registration
requirements.description: Register with the Florida Department of Revenue if organization has employees
requirements.due_date: Within 15 days after first quarter with employees

requirements.name: Professional Fundraising Consultant Registration
requirements.description: Registration required if using professional fundraising consultants
requirements.agency: Florida Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services

notes: Florida has unique charitable solicitation oversight through the Department of Agriculture rather than the Attorney General. The state has moderate nonprofit regulation with annual reporting to both the Department of State and Agriculture for organizations soliciting donations.

key_agencies.name: Florida Department of State - Division of Corporations
Florida Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
Florida Department of Revenue
key_agencies.role: Sales tax exemptions and employment taxes
